hero.title: Discover the Power of Keto
hero.subtitle: Transform your health with our expert guidance and resources. Start your ketogenic journey today.

nutrition.title: Nutritional Benefits
nutrition.description: Discover how a ketogenic diet can put your body in ketosis and start burning fat effectively for sustainable weight loss.

guides.description: Access our extensive collection of articles and resources to guide your keto journey every step of the way.

success.title: Success Stories
success.description: Read about the amazing transformations our community members have achieved with their ketogenic lifestyle.
